question:
What is the full form of ‘MICR’ in MICR code?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 09/01/2021 (Shift-II)
option_1: Marking Ink Character Recognition
option_2: Magnetic Ink Character Recognition
option_3: Magnetic Ink Character Reconstruction
option_4: Magnetic Ink Character Registration
solution:
• The full form of MICR in MICR code is Magnetic Ink Character Recognition.
  • MICR technology is used in banking to process cheques and other documents.
  • It involves printing characters with special magnetic ink which can be read by machines.

Additional Information:

  • MICR improves the speed and accuracy of cheque processing.
  • The magnetic ink characters are located at the bottom of cheques.
  • This technology helps in preventing fraud and errors.

question:
IANA oversees the allocation of IP address to organizations and individuals. What is the full form of IANA?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 09/01/2021 (Shift-II)
option_1: Internet Assigned Number Automation
option_2: Internet Assigned Number Authority
option_3: Internet Assigned Nomenclature Authority
option_4: Internet Associated Number Authority
solution:
• The full form of IANA is Internet Assigned Numbers Authority.
  • IANA is responsible for overseeing global IP address allocation, DNS root zone management, and other Internet protocol resources.
  • It plays a crucial role in maintaining the stable operation of the Internet.

Additional Information:

  • IANA operates under the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN).
  • It coordinates the unique identifiers that allow devices to communicate on the Internet.
  • Understanding IANA helps in grasping the structure of Internet governance.

question:
ISDN is a digital telephone service that can transmit voice, data and information over an existing single telephone line. What is the full form of ISDN?

RRB NTPC Stage-II 14/06/2022 (Shift-II)
option_1: Integrated Services Diversified Network
option_2: Integrated Serves Digital Network
option_3: Interpreted Services Digital Network
option_4: Integrated Services Digital Network
solution:
• The full form of ISDN is Integrated Services Digital Network.
  • ISDN is a set of communication standards for simultaneous digital transmission of voice, video, data, and other network services over the traditional circuits of the public switched telephone network.
  • It enables faster and better quality communication compared to analog systems.

Additional Information:

  • ISDN supports multiple digital channels for voice and data.
  • It was widely used before broadband internet became common.
  • Understanding ISDN is important in telecommunications history and technology.

question:
With respect to Internet, the full-form of ISP is:

RRB NTPC Stage-I 08/04/2021 (Shift-II)
solution:
• The full form of ISP with respect to the Internet is Internet Service Provider.
  • An ISP is a company or organization that provides individuals and other organizations access to the Internet.
  • ISPs also provide related services such as web hosting and domain registration.

Additional Information:

  • Common examples of ISPs include companies like Airtel, Jio, BSNL, etc.
  • ISPs offer various types of internet connections like broadband, fiber, DSL, etc.
  • Understanding ISP is fundamental to knowing how internet access works.

question:
In the context of web pages, what does SEO stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 07/03/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• In the context of web pages, SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization.
  • SEO is the practice of improving the quality and quantity of website traffic by increasing the visibility of a website or a web page to users of a web search engine.
  • It involves optimizing content, keywords, and website structure to rank higher in search engine results.

Additional Information:

  • Good SEO practices help websites attract more visitors organically.
  • It includes both on-page and off-page optimization techniques.
  • Understanding SEO is crucial for digital marketing and website management.

question:
What is the full form of RDRAM?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/04/2021 (Shift-I)
option_1: Rambus Dynamic Random Access Memory
option_2: Read Disc Random Access Memory
option_3: Removable Disc Read Access Module
option_4: Read Dynamic Random Arrays Material
solution:
• The full form of RDRAM is Rambus Dynamic Random Access Memory.
  • RDRAM is a type of RAM developed by Rambus Inc., designed to provide high-speed data transfer.
  • It was used in some computers and gaming consoles to improve memory performance.

Additional Information:

  • RDRAM offered faster data rates compared to conventional SDRAM.
  • However, it was more expensive and less widely adopted.
  • Understanding RDRAM is useful in studying computer memory technologies.

question:
What does CDMA stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/03/2021 (Shift-II)
option_1: Code Division Maximum Access
option_2: Core Division Multiple Access
option_3: Core Division Maximum Access
option_4: Code Division Multiple Access
solution:
• CDMA stands for Code Division Multiple Access.
  • It is a digital cellular technology used for mobile communication.
  • CDMA allows multiple users to share the same frequency band by assigning unique codes to each user.

Additional Information:

  • CDMA improves the capacity and security of wireless communication.
  • It is widely used in 2G and 3G mobile networks.
  • Understanding CDMA is important in telecommunications.

question:
OSI stands for –

RRB JE Stage-II 31/08/2019 (Shift-I)
solution:
• OSI stands for Open System Interconnection.
  • The OSI model is a conceptual framework used to understand and implement standard protocols in seven layers for computer networking.
  • It helps different systems communicate over a network.

Additional Information:

  • The seven layers of OSI are Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, and Application.
  • OSI model facilitates interoperability between different network technologies.
  • Understanding OSI is fundamental for network design and troubleshooting.

question:
The full form of IBM in IBM Corporations is:

RRB NTPC Stage-I 07/03/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• The full form of IBM in IBM Corporation is International Business Machines.
  • IBM is a multinational technology and consulting company known for its computer hardware and software products.
  • It played a key role in the development of early computers and continues to be a major player in IT.

Additional Information:

  • IBM was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Armonk, New York.
  • The company offers services in cloud computing, AI, and enterprise software.
  • Knowing IBM’s full form is basic general knowledge in technology.

question:
What is the full form of DDL in terms of computer jargon?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 21/01/2021 (Shift-II)
solution:
• The full form of DDL in computer jargon is Data Definition Language.
  • DDL is a subset of SQL used to define and manage database structures such as tables, indexes, and schemas.
  • It includes commands like CREATE, ALTER, and DROP.

Additional Information:

  • DDL commands are used to create, modify, and delete database objects.
  • Understanding DDL is essential for database management and design.
  • It differs from DML (Data Manipulation Language) which handles data operations.

question:
What is the full form of FDDI?

RRB JE Stage-II 29/08/2019 (Evening)
option_1: Fiber Distributed Dual Interface
option_2: Fiber Distributed Data Interface
option_3: Fiber Data Distributed Interface
option_4: Fiber Dual Distributed Interface
solution:
• The full form of FDDI is Fiber Distributed Data Interface.
  • FDDI is a standard for data transmission in a local area network that can extend in range up to 200 kilometers.
  • It uses optical fiber as the transmission medium and provides high-speed data transfer.

Additional Information:

  • FDDI supports data rates up to 100 Mbps.
  • It uses a dual-ring architecture for fault tolerance.
  • Understanding FDDI is important in the study of network technologies.

question:
What is the full form CLI in Computer terminology?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 19/01/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• The full form of CLI in computer terminology is Command Line Interface.
  • CLI allows users to interact with the computer by typing commands in a text-based interface.
  • It is widely used for system administration and programming tasks.

Additional Information:

  • CLI provides more control and flexibility compared to graphical interfaces.
  • Common CLI environments include Windows Command Prompt, Linux Terminal, and macOS Terminal.
  • Understanding CLI is essential for advanced computer operations and troubleshooting.

question:
What is URL?

RRB NTPC (Multiple Shifts)
option_3: Address of the web page displayed on the internet
solution:
• URL stands for the Address of the web page displayed on the internet.
  • URL (Uniform Resource Locator) specifies the location of a resource on the internet.
  • It is used by web browsers to access websites.

Additional Information:

  • A typical URL looks like: https://www.example.com.
  • URLs consist of the protocol, domain name, and sometimes a path or query.
  • Understanding URLs is fundamental to navigating the internet.

question:
In Computer field, OLE is the abbreviation of:

RRB NTPC Stage-I 30/12/2020 (Shift-II)
option_1: Object Linking and Enabling
option_4: Object Linking and Embedding
solution:
• In the computer field, OLE stands for Object Linking and Embedding.
  • OLE allows embedding and linking to documents and other objects.
  • It enables integration of content from different applications into a single document.

Additional Information:

  • OLE is commonly used in Microsoft Office applications.
  • It allows users to edit embedded objects using the source application.
  • Understanding OLE is important for working with compound documents.

question:
What does FQDN stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 17/02/2021 (Shift-II)
option_1: File Qualified Division Name
option_2: Fully Qualified Domain Name
option_3: Frequency Query Domain Name
option_4: Fully Qualified Disk Name
solution:
• FQDN stands for Fully Qualified Domain Name.
  • It is the complete domain name for a specific computer or host on the internet.
  • FQDN specifies all domain levels, including the top-level domain (TLD).

Additional Information:

  • An example of FQDN is www.example.com. where the trailing dot represents the root domain.
  • FQDN ensures precise identification of a host in the Domain Name System (DNS).
  • Understanding FQDN is important for network configuration and web hosting.

question:
What is the full form of DHCP in networking system?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 30/12/2020 (Shift-I)
option_1: Display House Control Protocol
option_2: Dynamic Host Control Point
option_3: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol
option_4: Data Host Control Panel
solution:
• The full form of DHCP in networking is Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol.
  • DHCP is a network management protocol used to automatically assign IP addresses to devices on a network.
  • It simplifies network administration by automating the IP address assignment process.

Additional Information:

  • DHCP reduces errors from manual IP configuration.
  • It enables devices to join a network seamlessly.
  • Understanding DHCP is essential for network setup and management.

question:
What is the full form of DOS?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/04/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• The full form of DOS is Disk Operating System.
  • DOS is an early operating system that manages disk storage and provides a command-line interface.
  • It was widely used before graphical user interfaces became common.

Additional Information:

  • MS-DOS (Microsoft Disk Operating System) was one of the most popular DOS versions.
  • DOS commands are still used in Windows command prompt.
  • Understanding DOS helps in learning the basics of operating systems.

question:
What is a visual display unit (VDU)?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/04/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• A Visual Display Unit (VDU) is a Monitor.
  • It is an output device that displays images, text, and videos generated by the computer.
  • VDUs allow users to interact visually with the computer system.

Additional Information:

  • Monitors can be CRT, LCD, LED, or OLED types.
  • The quality and resolution of a VDU affect the clarity of the display.
  • Understanding VDUs is important for hardware knowledge.

question:
In Internet technology, what does DNS stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 08/03/2021 (Shift-II)
solution:
• In Internet technology, DNS stands for Domain Name System.
  • DNS translates human-readable domain names (like www.example.com) into IP addresses that computers use to identify each other.
  • It acts like the phonebook of the internet.

Additional Information:

  • DNS is essential for browsing the web and accessing internet services.
  • Without DNS, users would need to remember numerical IP addresses.
  • Understanding DNS is crucial for network management and internet functionality.

question:
What does BHIM stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 15/02/2021 (Shift-I)
option_1: Bheem Intraface for Mobile
option_2: Bharat Intraface for Money
option_3: Bheem Interface for Mobile
option_4: Bharat Interface for Money
solution:
• BHIM stands for Bharat Interface for Money.
  • It is a digital payment application developed by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI).
  • BHIM facilitates fast and secure cashless payments through the Unified Payments Interface (UPI).

Additional Information:

  • BHIM app enables users to send or receive money using a mobile device.
  • It promotes digital transactions and financial inclusion in India.
  • Understanding BHIM is important for modern digital payments.

question:
What is the full form of VR in computer technology?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 11/02/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• In computer technology, VR stands for Virtual Reality.
  • Virtual Reality is a simulated experience that can be similar to or completely different from the real world.
  • It uses computer technology to create immersive environments for users.

Additional Information:

  • VR is widely used in gaming, training simulations, education, and medical applications.
  • It typically involves devices like VR headsets or goggles.
  • Understanding VR is important for emerging technologies and digital experiences.

question:
What is the full form of PDF in the context of file formats?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 09/02/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• The full form of PDF in the context of file formats is Portable Document Format.
  • PDF is a file format developed by Adobe to present documents independently of software, hardware, or operating system.
  • It preserves the formatting of documents across different platforms.

Additional Information:

  • PDFs are widely used for sharing documents like reports, forms, and eBooks.
  • They support text, images, hyperlinks, and even multimedia.
  • Understanding PDF is essential for document management and sharing.

question:
FTTP stands for:

RRB NTPC Stage-I 08/02/2021 (Shift-I)
option_1: Fusion To The Premises
option_2: Fiber To The Permission
option_3: Fiber To The Premises
option_4: Frame To The Permission
solution:
• FTTP stands for Fiber To The Premises.
  • It is a broadband network architecture that uses optical fiber to provide high-speed internet access directly to homes or businesses.
  • FTTP delivers faster and more reliable internet compared to traditional copper wire connections.

Additional Information:

  • FTTP is also known as Fiber To The Home (FTTH).
  • It supports high bandwidth and is suitable for streaming, gaming, and other data-intensive applications.
  • Understanding FTTP is important for modern telecommunications infrastructure.

question:
In Computer terminology, what is the full form of IDN?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 25/01/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• In computer terminology, IDN stands for Internationalized Domain Name.
  • IDNs allow domain names to include characters from non-ASCII scripts, such as Arabic, Chinese, Cyrillic, and others.
  • This enables internet users worldwide to access websites in their native languages and scripts.

Additional Information:

  • IDNs help make the internet more accessible and user-friendly globally.
  • They are encoded using Punycode for compatibility with the DNS system.
  • Understanding IDNs is important for global internet localization.

question:
In the field of computers and Internet, what does W3C stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 12/01/2021 (Shift-I)
option_1: World Wide Web Consortium
option_2: World Wide Web Commission
option_3: World Wide Web Centre
option_4: World Wide Web Content
solution:
• In the field of computers and Internet, W3C stands for World Wide Web Consortium.
  • W3C is an international community that develops open standards to ensure the long-term growth of the Web.
  • It is responsible for creating protocols and guidelines for web technologies like HTML, CSS, and XML.

Additional Information:

  • Founded by Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the World Wide Web.
  • W3C standards promote interoperability and accessibility.
  • Understanding W3C is important for web development and design.

question:
In Computer field, what does LIFO stand for?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/01/2021 (Shift-I)
solution:
• In the computer field, LIFO stands for Last-In-First-Out.
  • It is a method used for managing data structures like stacks, where the most recently added item is the first to be removed.
  • LIFO is commonly used in memory management and algorithm design.

Additional Information:

  • The opposite of LIFO is FIFO (First-In-First-Out).
  • Understanding LIFO helps in solving problems involving data storage and retrieval.
  • It is widely applied in programming and computer science concepts.

question:
What type of file does the CSS file extender usually refer to?

(No exam code provided)
solution:
• The CSS file extension usually refers to a Hypertext related file.
  • CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets, used to describe the presentation and layout of web pages written in HTML.
  • It controls the design aspects like colors, fonts, spacing, and positioning.

Additional Information:

  • CSS files work alongside HTML files to create visually appealing websites.
  • They help maintain consistency across multiple web pages.
  • Understanding CSS is essential for web development and design.

question:
What is the extension of PDA?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 12/04/2016 (Shift-III)
solution:
• The full form of PDA is Personal Digital Assistant.
  • PDAs are handheld devices that combine computing, telephone/fax, internet, and networking features.
  • They were widely used before the advent of smartphones.

Additional Information:

  • PDAs help manage personal information like contacts, calendars, and emails.
  • Modern smartphones have largely replaced PDAs.
  • Understanding PDA is useful for learning the evolution of mobile devices.

question:
ICT is abbreviated as –

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/04/2016 (Shift-III)
solution:
• ICT stands for Information Communication Technology.
  • ICT encompasses technologies that provide access to information through telecommunications.
  • It includes the internet, wireless networks, cell phones, and other communication mediums.

Additional Information:

  • ICT is essential in education, business, and governance.
  • It enables efficient communication and information sharing.
  • Understanding ICT is key to digital literacy and modern technology use.

question:
Who is considered the father of SMS?

RRB NTPC Stage-I 05/04/2016 (Shift-III)
solution:
• The father of SMS (Short Message Service) is Matti Makkonen.
  • He is credited with developing the concept of text messaging on mobile phones.
  • His work laid the foundation for the SMS technology widely used today.

Additional Information:

  • Matti Makkonen was a Finnish engineer and telecommunications expert.
  • SMS revolutionized communication by enabling quick, concise text messages.
  • Understanding the origin of SMS highlights the evolution of mobile communication.
